description: This file contains polyfills and utilities for web component imports, including WeakMap polyfill, MutationObserver polyfill, event and animation polyfills, and HTML import handling logic for the Polymer project.

classes.name: WeakMap
classes.description: Polyfill for WeakMap if not natively supported, providing set, get, delete, and has methods.

classes.name: JsMutationObserver
classes.description: Polyfill for MutationObserver, providing observe, disconnect, and takeRecords methods.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: Handles loading of external resources with caching and deduplication.

classes.name: Observer
classes.description: MutationObserver wrapper for observing DOM changes.

classes.name: importParser
classes.description: Object managing parsing of HTML import links, styles, and scripts.

methods.name: wrapIfNeeded
methods.description: Wraps nodes with ShadowDOMPolyfill if needed.

methods.name: whenReady
methods.description: Executes callback when DOM is ready and imports are loaded.

methods.name: isImportLoaded
methods.description: Checks if a link element's import is loaded.

methods.name: makeDocument
methods.description: Creates a new HTMLDocument from resource string and URL.
